title: How do you disenchant Project blueprints?
body:
I still have a PROJECT: Zed skin shard blueprint and a PROJECT: Katarina first strike icon blueprint and I don't know how to get rid of them >_< Riot said that after the even finished on the 16th you'd be able to disenchant these thing for a bit of essence, but whenever I click on them the only potion I have is to fuse. 

Can someone please tell me what I'm missing?

replies.body: The[ project disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) event just recently ended, and plans are to allow leftover content to be disenchantable.  It's not enabled just yet, and I don't have an eta to provide for that right now.  Hang tight!

Oh ok, I thought you'd already made that possible and I was just doing something wrong.
Thanks!
